name: The 17th Year
description:
A short retrospective about the fun I had with my best friend in 2016, made for the FLATGAME Annual 2016.

Some flaunting of the rules with animations made from photos, because I can't art properly.

Use D or the right arrow key to move along.

Download for Windows and Mac. HTML to follow when Unity stops sulking.

Music:

Nonstop Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
